languages.text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. That effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and when each ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

languages.text: Der Offizier der Flotte gewährt jedem Verbündeten (und sich selbst) in einem Radius von 5 Feldern den {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Gestützt{/g}-Effekt. Der Effekt dauert 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang an. Der Offizier der Flotte erhält zu Beginn des Kampfes +1 Ladung dieser Fähigkeit, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} im Kampf erstmals unter 50 % sinken und jedes Mal, wenn ein Verbündeter im Kampf erstmals das Bewusstsein verliert.
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: Der Offizier der Flotte gewährt jedem Verbündeten (und sich selbst) in einem Radius von 5 Feldern den {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Gestützt{/g}-Effekt. Der Effekt dauert 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang an. Der Offizier der Flotte erhält zu Beginn des Kampfes +1 Ladung dieser Fähigkeit, wenn seine {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} im Kampf erstmals unter 50 % sinken und jedes Mal, wenn ein Verbündeter im Kampf erstmals das Bewusstsein verliert.

languages.text: L'officier de marine octroie l'effet {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Prêt{/g} à tous ses alliés situés dans un rayon de 5 cases et à lui-même. Cet effet dure 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. L'officier de marine gagne +1 charge de cette capacité au début du combat, quand ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} passent sous la barre des 50 % pour la première fois au cours du combat, et chaque fois que l'un de ses alliés perd connaissance pour la première fois au cours du combat.
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: L'officier de marine octroie l'effet {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Prêt{/g} à tous ses alliés situés dans un rayon de 5 cases et à lui-même. Cet effet dure 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. L'officier de marine gagne +1 charge de cette capacité au début du combat, quand ses {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} passent sous la barre des 50 % pour la première fois au cours du combat, et chaque fois que l'un de ses alliés perd connaissance pour la première fois au cours du combat.

languages.text: 海军军官给予距离5格内所有盟友（包括海军军官本人）{g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}准备就绪{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。战斗开始时，海军军官拥有1次此能力使用次数。当海军军官的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}在战斗中首次降至50%以下时，以及每当有盟友陷入昏迷状态时，都会额外获得1次使用次数。
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: 海军军官给予距离5格内所有盟友（包括海军军官本人）{g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}准备就绪{/g}效果，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。战斗开始时，海军军官拥有1次此能力使用次数。当海军军官的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}在战斗中首次降至50%以下时，以及每当有盟友陷入昏迷状态时，都会额外获得1次使用次数。

languages.text: El oficial de la Armada otorga el efecto {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}preparado{/g} a todos los aliados (incluido él mismo) en un radio de 5 casillas. El efecto dura 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El oficial de la Armada gana +1 carga de esta capacidad al inicio del combate, cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} se reducen por debajo del 50 % por primera vez en combate y la primera vez que cada aliado cae inconsciente en combate.
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: El oficial de la Armada otorga el efecto {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}preparado{/g} a todos los aliados (incluido él mismo) en un radio de 5 casillas. El efecto dura 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}. El oficial de la Armada gana +1 carga de esta capacidad al inicio del combate, cuando sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} se reducen por debajo del 50 % por primera vez en combate y la primera vez que cada aliado cae inconsciente en combate.

languages.text: 海軍士官は5セル以内の味方（自身を含む）に{g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}衝撃に備えろ{/g}効果を付与する。この効果は1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}持続する。海軍士官は戦闘開始時、戦闘中に{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が初めて50%未満になった時、そして味方が戦闘中に初めて意識を失った時に、このアビリティのチャージを+1得る。
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. That effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and when each ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

languages.text: Офицер Имперского флота дает эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{/g} каждому союзнику (и самому себе) в радиусе 5 клеток на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Офицер Имперского флота получает +1 использование этой способности в начале боя; когда его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} впервые опускается ниже 50%; и при первой потере сознания для каждого союзника в бою.
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. That effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and when each ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: Офицер Имперского флота дает эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{/g} каждому союзнику (и самому себе) в радиусе 5 клеток на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Офицер Имперского флота получает +1 использование этой способности в начале боя; когда его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} впервые опускается ниже 50%; и при первой потере сознания для каждого союзника в бою.

Офицер Имперского флота дает эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{/g} каждому союзнику (и самому себе) в радиусе 5 клеток на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Офицер Имперского флота получает +1 использование этой способности в начале боя; когда его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} впервые опускается ниже 50%; и при первой потере сознания для каждого союзника в бою.

Офицер Имперского флота дает эффект {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}готовность{/g} каждому союзнику (и самому себе) в радиусе 5 клеток на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}. Офицер Имперского флота получает +1 использование этой способности в начале боя; когда его {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} впервые опускается ниже 50%; и при первой потере сознания для каждого союзника в бою.

languages.text: Donanma Subayı, 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm dost birimlere (kendisi de dâhil) {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}çarpışmaya hazır{/g} etkisi kazandırır. Etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Donanma Subayı; çatışmanın başında, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı çatışmada ilk kez %50'nin altına indiğinde ve çatışmada her bir dost birimi ilk kez baygın düştüğünde bu kabiliyetin +1 kullanım hakkını kazanır.
languages.original_text: The Navy Officer grants the {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}braced{/g} effect to each ally (including themselves) in a 5-cell radius. The effect lasts for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}. The Navy Officer gains +1 charge of this ability at the start of combat, when their {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} drop below 50% for the first time in combat, and each time an ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.

traits.locale_text: Donanma Subayı, 5 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm dost birimlere (kendisi de dâhil) {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}çarpışmaya hazır{/g} etkisi kazandırır. Etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer. Donanma Subayı; çatışmanın başında, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı çatışmada ilk kez %50'nin altına indiğinde ve çatışmada her bir dost birimi ilk kez baygın düştüğünde bu kabiliyetin +1 kullanım hakkını kazanır.

All allies in a 5-cell radius gain {g|f:b9f9ef145708451f81283a73c16c527d}Braced{/g} effect.

Get a charge when Navy Officer drops below 50%wounds for the first time in combat.
Get a charge when ally falls unconscious for the first time in combat.
